attributes.title: not worth ur time 😾😾
attributes.review: so i downloaded this app to see the orange in action 😼 but then it told me that i’m muslim and they’ll deport me if i keep the app! 👹 how disrespectful i just wanna support my wonderful president 😍😍 but anyways i do not like him anymore because that was very disrespectful and rude 😢 so stan obama for clear skin everyone! 🤩🤩😚😚

attributes.review: #1 in news? Stop lying. The software is trash! Come on Trump! Yeah I’m done supporting you. Shame on you and this app! And the people who work for you!

attributes.title: Joe 2020
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever used in my entire life, it is EXTREMELY hard to navigate, it is very misleading, and it glorifies awful people. ✨
